args:
Determine whether this social media post from Donald Trump contains a personal insult to Kamala Harris's intelligence. Simply return "yes" or "no".
content: “As the nation’s oldest and largest law enforcement labor organization, the FOP’s presidential endorsement is one of the most sought-after endorsements by candidates running for the presidency…The FOP is the number one voice of America’s law enforcement. We have a responsibility to our members, to the 800,000 sworn law enforcement officers in the United States, and to the communities they serve to do our part in determining the direction in which our country will head." President Patrick YoesNational Fraternal Order of Police https://www.foxnews.com/politics/fraternal-order-police-endorses-trump-president-blast-harris-defunder-crime-wave
https://links.truthsocial.com/link/113092728867232574
Trump accepts largest police union endorsement, blasts Harris as a 'defunder': 'Kamala's crime wave'
The nation’s oldest and largest police labor organization endorsed former President Trump Friday, saying there is “zero doubt" they want him in the White House for a second term.
